include_directories(
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/jaulib/include
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/include
)

set (salesmangen_SRCS
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/jaulib/src/debug.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/jaulib/src/basic_types.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/jaulib/src/environment.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/gentech/gentech.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/gen-salesman/sales.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/gen-salesman/sales_gen.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/gen-salesman/sales_genparin.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/gen-salesman/sales_main.cpp
# autogenerated files
  ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/../version.cpp
)

add_executable (salesmangen_exe ${salesmangen_SRCS})
set_target_properties(salesmangen_exe PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME salesmangen)

install(TARGETS salesmangen_exe RUNTIME DESTINATION ${CMAKE_INSTALL_BINDIR})
